title: Gulabi Polki and Emerald Cocktail Ring
features: The ring features a floral motif with uncut Polki diamonds forming the petals, interspersed with vibrant emeralds. Surrounded by diamond melee, creating a brilliant halo. The setting uses a traditional kundan technique to showcase the beauty of uncut diamonds. The gold has a traditional Hyderabadi finish. A statement piece of wearable art that perfectly marries classic design with contemporary flair.
occasions: or any event where you want to make a statement.
description: This ring is a true heirloom piece, crafted with authentic Polki diamonds and vibrant emeralds. Its unique design and exceptional craftsmanship make it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The blend of traditional Kundan artistry with a modern cocktail ring style makes it both timeless and on-trend. The gold is 22K, ensuring lasting shine and durability. The Hyderabadi finish adds a touch of regal elegance.
